|ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8316; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:15:6D |bootwait = |stockbootloader = RedBoot;;; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = U-MEDIA |manuf_model = MPB-890A |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 08/31/2009 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "081R-MPB890AN00 R0A" is printed on a sticker attached to the bottom of the unit. :This would seem to indicate the device was manufactured by ''[[U-MEDIA]]''. :"Designed in U.S.A." is silkscreened on the top of the board. '''Note:''' The PCI controller on [[Atheros]] AR7161 [https://dev.openwrt.org/ticket/7759 cannot handle I/O resources].
This isn't a problem for ''[[Atheros]]'' based Wi-Fi cards, but it is generally a problem for others.. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.ubnt.com/wiki/RouterStation_Pro ''RouterStation Pro'' on the '''Ubiquiti Wiki'''] *[http://forum.ubnt.com/showthread.php?s=fc249fa566e49567040c71dd718499cd&t=11148&page=2 Estimated release date of 08/31/2009 per '''UBNT''' forums] ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/routerstation.pro On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|activation}} Supported by dd-wrt as of = v.24 pre sp2 - build 12909 - 20090915 Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/ubiquiti/ubiquiti_routerstationpro |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/routerstation_pro |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=20668 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 10.03 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
